original: LILJHAGEN, Bengt Gustaf, Ing-enjör, Kö- ping, f Sthlm 25/9 95 av statskonsulent G L o Göta Tundal, gm Gerda Arfwedson. Hsands tekn elem.sk, tekn stud USA. Anst AB S Varvet Sthlm 19—20, C E Johansson Inc, Prongkrepsie USA, 20 — 22, Greenfield Tap & Die Corp, Mäss, 23 — 28, Kpgs mek verkst AB sed. 28. Lstkapt. V. styr. ordf Kpgs vatten-o elverk, Kpgs badh o tvättinrättn, sekr Kpg-Arb Istfrn. LstftjSM.
translated: LILJHAGEN, Bengt Gustaf, Ing-enjör (Engineer), Köping, born in Stockholm on September 25th, 1895, to G L o Göta Tundal, a state consultant. Married to Gerda Arfwedson. Studied technical elementary school. Further technical studies in the USA. Employed at AB S Varvet Stockholm from 1919 to 1920, C E Johansson Inc, Prongkrepsie USA, from 1920 to 1922, Greenfield Tap & Die Corp, Mäss, from 1923 to 1928, and Kpgs mek verkst AB since 1928. Lieutenant Captain. Vice chairman of the board of Kpgs vatten-o elverk (water and power plant), Kpgs badh o tvättinrättn (baths and laundry facility), secretary of Kpg-Arb Istfrn (workers' institute). Received LstftjSM (Long-Service Medal).

memberOf.name: Kpgs vatten-o elverk (water and power plant)
Kpgs badh o tvättinrättn (baths and laundry facility)
